Cookbook: How to build a IPDR Exporter

Detailed Description

Like most software, there is no one "best way" to build a IPDR Exporter. But the following steps give a method that should work well in most cases.

An extremely simple Exporter is in given in the "IPDRsimple.c" file, and a more complex example is in "IPDRsim.cpp".

  1. Overview
  2. Cookbook: Terminology
  3. Cookbook: Determine needs
  4. Cookbook: Determine downstream processing needs
  5. Cookbook: Define templates
  6. Cookbook: Send data
  7. Cookbook: Error and event handling
  8. Cookbook: Integration issues
    • Cookbook: Integrating configuration
    • Cookbook: Integrating IPDR transmitter (client) start/stop
    • Cookbook: Integrating the IPDR MIB
    • Cookbook: Integrating IPDR monitoring
  9. Cookbook: Sizing
  10. Cookbook: Implementing the platform-dependent layer (porting)
  11. Cookbook: Testing and using
  12. Samples
    • IPDRsimple.c - a very simple IPDR exporter simulator
    • IPDRsim.cpp - a more complete IPDR exporter simulator
